title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models Chat, Embeddings, and Tool-calling interfaces.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama API (async + sync).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web frontend for any Ollama model.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-chat-git
summary: Drop-in CLI chat wrapper with git-style prompt templates.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Rich-terminal chat client with markdown, history, and prompt chains.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama (chat, embed, pull, list).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack with CUDA & OpenCL images.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with Swagger docs.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS-Code extension to chat, generate code & docs using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client for Ollama (same API as official JS).

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that proxies to Ollama with token-counter and voice.
